column7: Basic principles and examples for adapting and applying the plasma state to solve a number of modern engineering problems. Plasma processing of materials for microelectronics and other uses, lighting, plasma displays, and other technologies. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: ECE 329 or PHYS 435.
column9: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: ECE 329 or PHYS 435.
